function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of hygiene and sanitation in healthcare facilities","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases like COVID-19","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, implementation of strict hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Advanced cleaning and disinfection technologies, automated sanitation systems","People":"Healthcare staff, patients, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Poor indoor air quality and thermal comfort in healthcare facilities","Impact":"Facilitation of airborne transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Installation of high-efficiency air filtration systems, maintenance of proper ventilation, monitoring of indoor air quality","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filtration systems, ventilation control systems, air quality monitoring devices","People":"Healthcare staff, patients, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Inefficient building automation and control system","Impact":"Suboptimal indoor conditions leading to potential health risks and high energy consumption","Mitigation":"Proper design, installation, and operation of building automation and control system for energy-efficient and optimal indoor conditions","Technologies":"Building automation and control systems, energy management systems","People":"Building operators, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management"}]}
